review: She is a fantastic professional with great expertise. She treats her patients with utmost care and answers all the queries with alot of patience. She is always reachable via phone or whatsapp as and when required and always paid attention to our needs and concern. I would definitely recommend her to everyone. She's the perfect doctor a patient can ever have!!

Dr. Nikita has been more like a family than just a doctor for us. Always dealt with our queries in a calm and composed manner. Thank you for been there for us on our journey and we look forward to remain associated with you. Strongly recommend for anyone who is looking for an awesome gynae üëç

My story is very different from other pregnant ladies. I had a bicornuate uterus case and because of this I lost my 5 month baby boy. After 1.5 years I was expecting again, but because of my case history koi bhe doctor mera case nahe le raha tha. Thanks to my father.. Unhe kisine Dr. Nikita Ji ke bare me bataya. I went to her clinic and She was like god for me at that time. I was in very depressive condition at that time. But she is the only one who gave me good suggestion, proper treatment, and positive track. 
Every time whenever I visited her clinic, she always show me positivity.  24 hrs availability on phone. 
She is the only doctor jin hone end tak mera sath diya and finally I become a Mother of a daughter. 
Thank you Dr. Nikita you. ***** ***** **** **** ** ***** **** **** **** ****
Thanku
Dr Nikita Jindal is polite and friendly, she treats patient as her own family member, understands the problem very well, also explain the treatment procedure as well.
Dr. Nikita is a very experience doctor. she has very good wisdom of her proffesion. she treated my wife pregnancy case as a family member not as a relation of doctor and patient.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words and valuable feedback
